## Description {#details}

A special type of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> that wraps an existing IR basic block.

Recipes of the block get added before the first non-phi instruction in the wrapped block. Note: At the moment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpirbasicblock">VPIRBasicBlock</a> can only be used to wrap <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a>&#39;s preheader block.

Definition at line 3681 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
